verbose_text: In support of the notion of lysosomal amino acid sensing, depletion of lysosomal amino acids through overexpression of the lysosomal proton amino acid transporter PAT1 (SLC38A1) turns off mTORC1 signalling [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: overexpression of the lysosomal proton amino acid transporter PAT1 (SLC38A1
